title: Our splendid view is a delight - see this 2 bed 2 bath for yourself!
posting_body: ['Welcome to Park Place Northville', 'Rental Information', 'Pricing:', '$1760 - $2124/Month | 2', 'Bedroom 2 Bath | 1129 sq ft', 'Lease Term:', '4-Month, 5-Month, 6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month, 14-Month', 'show contact info', 'Apartment Amenities', '✓ Deluxe and Premium Available (Select Units)', '✓ Dishwasher', '✓ Frost Free Refrigerator', '✓ Granite Upgrade (Premium Units Only)', '✓ Heating', '✓ High Speed Internet Access', '✓ In-Home Washer/Dryer', '✓ Private Balcony or Patio', '✓ Spacious Master Bedroom', '✓ Stainless Steel Appliances', 'Community Features', '✓ 24 Hour Fitness Gym', '✓ Business Center', '✓ Clubhouse', '✓ Laundry Facilities', '✓ Online Payments Available', '✓ On-Site Maintenance', '✓ Sundeck', '✓ Swimming Pool', '✓ Volleyball Court', '✓ Wifi-Cafe', '✓ Center Sidewalks Throughout', '✓ Close to Downtown Northville', '✓ Concierge', '✓ House Plant Watering Service', '✓ Lush Landscaping', '✓ Luxury Building', '✓ Minutes from shopping, dining, and entertainment', '✓ Package Receiving', '✓ Pets Allowed', '✓ Smoke-Free', 'About Community', 'Description:', 'YES, WE ARE OPEN!', 'CALL NOW TO SCHEDULE AN IN-PERSON TOUR!', 'OR LET US SHOW YOU THROUGH FACETIME!', 'Start your new chapter at Park Place!', 'Our luxury apartments for rent in Northville have everything you need!', 'From spacious floor plans to high-end amenities that are sure to help you live in style and luxury!', 'Click through our photo gallery and see why you should call Park Place your new home in Northville, Michigan!', 'Location:', '43001 Northville Place Dr', 'Northville, MI 48167', 'show contact info', 'Office Hours:', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 7:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Additional Information', 'Pet Policy:', 'We are extremely pet-friendly, however, dogs are only allowed in Buildings 1 through 10!', 'Also, we even have "While Away" pet care!', 'Pet rent is $30 per pet.', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Our Management Company:', 'JRK Property Holdings', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'A81A9D2DC8274E8']
